Html: Its currently rating agility far too high, agility only affects melee crit which reduces its value since it only affects a part of our damage

Not entirely true. With bladed armor, every 18 agility gives 1 attack power (as 1 agi = 2 armor, 36 armor = 1 ap). Looking at my Relative Stat Values I see Agility at the bottom with a mere .33. I will agree that its value should be lower though.
